contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox station | name = Universitate | type = | style = RATB | image = Universitatii metro station.jpg | image_caption = | address = [[University Square, Bucharest|University Square]], <br />[[Sector 1 (Bucharest)|Sector 1]], [[Bucharest]] | country = [[Romania]] | coordinates = | line = <!-- line information is detailed under "services" --> | other = | structure = Underground | platform = 2 - One [[island platform]] | depth = | levels = | tracks = | parking = | bicycle = | baggage_check = | opened = October 1987 | closed = | rebuilt = | electrified = | ADA = | code = | owned = | zone = | smartcardname = [[Bucharest Metro#Card Activ|Card ACTIV]] | smartcardstatus = Available | former = | passengers = | pass_year = | pass_percent = | pass_system = | mpassengers = | services = {{s-rail|title=Bucharest Metro}}{{S-line|system=RATB|line=M2|previous=Piaţa Unirii|next=Piaţa Romană}} | map_locator = | web = }} '''Universitate''' (''University'') is a metro station located in [[University Square, Bucharest]], near the [[University of Bucharest]], the [[Ion Mincu University of Architecture and Urbanism|University of Architecture]], the [[National Theatre Bucharest]] and the [[InterContinental]] Hotel. The station is one of the deepest in the whole system, with a narrow platform, built around huge pillars. {{Coord|44.43595|26.10274|display=title|type:landmark_region:RO}} {{Bucharest Metro navbox}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Universitate Metro Station}} [[Category:Bucharest Metro stations]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1987]] {{Bucharest-metro-stub}} {{Romania-railstation-stub}}
